HTTP/1.1 200 OK Date: Thu, 14 Dec 2017 03:37:01 GMT Server: Apache X-Powered-By: PHP/5.3.3 Cache-Control: public Expires: Wed, 27 Dec 2017 22:37:01 EST Last-Modified: Wed, 07 Dec 2016 16:48:06 GMT Content-Length: 931 Connection: close Content-Type: text/javascript $(document).ready(function(){var reflowTimer=false;$(window).resize(function(){if(reflowTimer){clearTimeout(reflowTimer);} var height=0;if($('#news-events .inner-wrapper').css('float')=='left'){$('#news-events .inner-wrapper:first-child > *').each(function(){height=height+$(this).outerHeight();});} else{$('#news-events .inner-wrapper:last-child > *:first-child').height('');} if(height){height=height-2;reflowTimer=setTimeout(function(){$('#news-events .inner-wrapper:last-child > *:first-child').height(height);},10);}}).trigger('resize');$('#news-events #in-the-news ul a').click(function(){var linksList=$(this).closest('ul');if(typeof ga=='undefined'){} else if(linksList.hasClass('news-items')){ga('send','event','Panel: News Item Click',$(this).attr('href'),location.pathname);} else if(linksList.hasClass('pe-items')){ga('send','event','Panel: Public Engagement Item Click',$(this).attr('href'),location.pathname);}});});
